1.name: Feast
1.details: Killing a unit grants Xer’Ju increased maximum health and size permanently.[n]Killing large minion and monster doubles the effect while killing an enemy Hero triples the effect.

2.name: Tongue Lash
2.details: Xer’Ju licks in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to the first enemy hit.[n]Killing the target heals Xer’Ju by a small percentage of the target’s health.[n]Q’s hitbox increases based on Xer’Ju’s size.

3.name: W
3.details: Xer’Ju sends out a wave that deals magical damage (scaling with magical power) and taunts all enemies hit.[n]W’s hitbox increases based on Xer’Ju’s size.

4.name: Roll
4.details: Xer’Ju starts rolling and gradually picks up the speed.[n]Xer’Ju will only stop when E is cast again and when it hits a terrain or an enemy.[n]E can hit multiple enemies depending on Xer’Ju’s size, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and knock them back.

5.name: Devour
5.details: Xer’Ju devours an enemy Hero, dealing physical damage (scaling with maximum health) and suppressing the target.[n]Xer’Ju is slowed during the suppression but it can still move and use E.
